content: **tiny gray alien** **materials** yarn dk weight light grey and dark grey yarn stuffing material hook size 3 5mm **abbreviations** r row or round st stitch chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet scinc single_crochet increase single_crochet 2 into the same st scdec single_crochet decrease single_crochet next 2 st together / at the end of r indicates number of st you should have just worked **head and body make one ** worked in rounds each round is joined at the end with a slip_stitch into the first st then ch1 to begin next round continuing to work into the stitch you joined with alternatively use a stitch marker for seamless rounds magic loop or chain 4 and join r1 single_crochet 6 in magic loop or ch4 loop pull closed and join /6st r2 scinc in each st /12st r3 scinc in first st single_crochet in next st 6 times /18st r4 scinc in first st single_crochet in next 2 st 6 times /24st r5 scinc in first st single_crochet in next 3 st 6 times /30st r6 scinc in first st single_crochet in next 4 st 6 times /36st r7 single_crochet in each st /36st r8 scinc in first st single_crochet in next 5 st 6 times /42st r9 single_crochet in each st /42st r10 scinc in first st single_crochet in next 6 st 6 times /48st r11 single_crochet in each st /48st r12 single_crochet in each st /48st r13 single_crochet in each st /48st r14 single_crochet in each st /48st r15 scdec first 2 st single_crochet in next 6 st 6 times /42st r16 single_crochet in each st /42st r17 scdec first 2 st single_crochet in next 5 st 6 times /36st r18 single_crochet in each st /36st r19 scdec first 2 st single_crochet in next 4 st 6 times /30st r20 single_crochet in each st /30st r21 scdec first 2 st single_crochet in next 3 st 6 times /24st r22 single_crochet in each st /24 r23 single_crochet in each st /24 r24 single_crochet in each st /24 r25 single_crochet in each st /24 r26 single_crochet in each st /24 r27 single_crochet in each st /24 r28 single_crochet in each st /24 r29 single_crochet in each st /24 now stuff the body r30 scdec first 2 st single_crochet in next 2 st 6 times /18st r31 scdec in first 2 st single_crochet in next st 6 times /12st r32 scdec all around /6st cut the yarn leaving a tail for sewing **arms and legs make four ** worked in rounds each round is joined at the end with a slip_stitch into the first st then ch1 to begin next round continuing to work into the stitch you joined with alternatively use a stitch marker for seamless rounds magic loop or ch4 leave a longer tail to use as stuffing and join r1 sc8 in magic loop or ch4 loop pull closed and join /8st r2 single_crochet in each st /8st r3 single_crochet in each st /8st r4 single_crochet in each
